Rulings.Base:
1. You can use this effect even if the battle position of "Earthquake Giant" is changed during the Damage Step.
2. This effect targets your opponent's monster.
3. If a Flip Effect monster is flipped face-up by this effect, the Flip Effect is activated.
4. If you take control of the targeted monster before the effect of "Earthquake Giant" resolves, the monster's battle position will not be changed.
